title: HR Executive
description: Manage end-to-end recruitment processes including job postings, candidate screening, interviewing, and onboarding
Coordinate employee relations activities and assist in resolving workplace issues
Maintain and update HR records and databases using HRIS systems

title: HR Intern
description: Assisted in the recruitment process by screening resumes and scheduling interviews
Supported the HR team with employee onboarding and orientation sessions
Maintained employee records and assisted with HR administrative tasks

title: Conveyancer (HR Department)
description: Managed the end-to-end property conveyancing process
Drafted and reviewed legal documents including Form A, Form B, and Form F, ensuring compliance with RERA and DLD regulations
Maintained and updated daily, weekly, and monthly reports including sales performance, transaction logs, and compliance records

title: Admin Coordinator
description: Helped the HR team with staff records, onboarding new employees, and general office admin tasks
Managed and updated property listings, making sure all details like prices, unit sizes, and availability were correct
Provided administrative support to the sales team

title: Internee
description: Collected and organized data from surveys, interviews, and online research
Supported research projects by managing timelines, budgets, and resources
Created social media content and LinkedIn carousels to boost engagement

title: Marketing Assistant
description: Created brochures and conducted market research by analyzing competitor products in stores
Collaborated on content development, increasing online engagement by 20%
